headline: IDEXX Laboratories (NasdaqGS:IDXX) Price Moves -14% Over The Last Week Amid Market Volatility
summary: IDEXX Laboratories (NasdaqGS:IDXX) experienced a 14% decline over the last week, in line with the broader market turmoil where the S&P 500 fell by 12% amid heightened tariff tensions between the U.S. and China. The recent market volatility, driven by the imposition of new tariffs and China’s retaliatory measures, has largely weighed on various sectors, including healthcare and technology, which impact IDEXX's operational landscape. While some sectors like technology managed gains due to...
